shopifyCollection.title: Trouble Scouts
shopifyCollection.description: Pins, patches and camp flags for good kids (or adults) gone rad. Designed in collaboration with our pal Keith Buckley, lead singer of Every Time I Die.
shopifyCollection.descriptionHtml: Pins, patches and camp flags for good kids (or adults) gone rad. Designed in collaboration with our pal Keith Buckley, lead singer of Every Time I Die.

products.title: Always Picked First Embroidered Patch
products.description: It just can't be helped. This embroidered patch is part of the Oxford Pennant Trouble Scouts collection where we teamed up with Keith Buckley, lead singer of Every Time I Die, super cool dad and certified Trouble Scout Sensei to create new gear for nice kids who are a little too bored (or tired, or sugared up) for their own good. This design is also available as an enamel pin. Size: 3.5" Color: Black
products.descriptionHtml:
It just can't be helped. 

This embroidered patch is part of the Oxford Pennant Trouble Scouts collection where we teamed up with Keith Buckley, lead singer of Every Time I Die, super cool dad and certified Trouble Scout Sensei to create new gear for nice kids who are a little too bored (or tired, or sugared up) for their own good.

This design is also available as an enamel pin. 

Size: 3.5"

Color: Black

products.title: Are We There Yet Camp Flag

This design is also available as an embroidered patch. Size: 18" x 24" Material: Cut-and-sewn wool felt and screen-printed design Color: Black body, Cream, Red and Black details
